channel.title: Elvis Presley on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Edward Faulkner, Actor in John Wayne and Elvis Presley Films, Dies at 93
item.description: The Kentucky native worked often with director Andrew V. McLaglen and did lots of Westerns on screens big and small.

item.title: Edward Faulkner, Actor in John Wayne and Elvis Presley Films, Dies at 93
item.description: The Kentucky native worked often with director Andrew V. McLaglen and did lots of Westerns on screens big and small.

item.title: How Elvis Presley Was ‘Discovered’ by His Longtime Manager, Colonel Tom Parker: Excerpt From New Book ‘The Colonel and the King’
item.description: In many ways, it’s the origin story of the rock and roll revolution: How the man who called himself Colonel Tom Parker (although he never achieved such a military rank) discovered the man he would lof

item.title: Gary Smith, Eight-Time Emmy-Winning Producer, Dies at 90
item.description: His credits included ‘The Judy Garland Show,’ ‘Hullabaloo,’ Tony and Emmy telecasts and specials featuring Elvis Presley, Barbra Streisand and Burt Bacharach.

item.title: Gary Smith, Eight-Time Emmy-Winning Producer, Dies at 90
item.description: His credits included ‘The Judy Garland Show,’ ‘Hullabaloo,’ Tony and Emmy telecasts and specials featuring Elvis Presley, Barbra Streisand and Burt Bacharach.
